title: Republicans reject Trump tax-cut bill
shortDescription: Trump's sweeping tax bill failed to clear a key hurdle, as hardline Republicans wanted deeper cuts to programs like Medicaid.

title: Trump, Project 2025 and the plan to remake government | The Excerpt
shortDescription: What are the goals of Project 2025 and what roadmap does it lay out for deconstructing the administrative state?

title: Trump, Project 2025 and the plan to remake government
shortDescription: The goals of Project 2025 and its roadmap for deconstructing the administrative state.

title: Trump sees meager uptick in approval ratings mid-May
shortDescription: Polls released this week indicate a slight uptick in support for the president amid a splashy Middle East tour and high-profile court challenges.

title: Supreme Court deals blow to Trump, blocks deportations in emergency order
shortDescription: The Supreme Court said Venezuelan migrants haven't had enough time or information to protect their rights. Clarence Thomas and Sam Alito dissented.

title: Trump eager to see â€˜beautiful grandson' as he wraps Middle East trip
shortDescription: Tiffany Trump gave birth to President Donald Trump's 11th grandchild on May 15. What did Trump, Melania Trump say about it?

title: Federal government layoffs: Trump appeals to Supreme Court
shortDescription: The request came after a U.S. district judge in San Francisco blocked large-scale federal layoffs known as "reductions in force" for 14 days.

title: Republicans reject Trump tax-cut bill after president calls for unity
shortDescription: The sweeping tax bill failed to clear a key hurdle, as hardline Republicans wanting deeper cuts blocked it, a rare congressional setback for Trump.

title: Bronze statue of Melania Trump goes missing in Slovenia
shortDescription: The bronze statue replaced a wooden one badly burned by arson outside of Melania's hometown of Sevnica.

title: Trump says import tariff rates coming soon
shortDescription: During his trip to the Gulf, President Trump said his administration would be sending letters to countries informing them of new tariff rates.

title: Federal judge scolds Trump administration in Abrego Garcia case
shortDescription: Kilmar Abrego Garcia was deported to El Salvador in March in what the Trump administration admits was a mistake. His family has sued to get him back.

title: DOJ: Letting Trump fire independent boards excludes Federal Reserve
shortDescription: The comments to the U.S. Court of Appeals for the D.C. Circuit came in a case regarding Donald Trump's ability to fire members of independent boards.

title: Trump leaves Middle East with plans to meet Putin
shortDescription: President Trump departed the Middle East as talks between Ukraine and Russia began. He said he plans to meet with President Vladimir Putin soon.

title: Deals, disco and a blue carpet: Key moments from Trump's Mideast jaunt
shortDescription: President Donald Trump concluded a trip to the Middle East. It was heavy on pageantry, commerce and camel-appreciation.

title: Tiffany Trump reveals gender of baby
shortDescription: The daughter of President Donald Trump and ex-wife Marla Maples celebrated with a baby shower and seemingly revealed she's expecting a baby boy.

title: Florida killer's last words: 'President Trump, keep making America great'
shortDescription: Glen Rogers shouted out President Trump as he lay strapped to an execution gurney seconds before Florida executed him by lethal injection.

title: Theo Von gives surprise performance during Trump's visit to Qatar
shortDescription: Comedian and podcaster Theo Von made a surprise stand-up during President Donald Trump's visit at the Al-Udeid Air Base in Qatar.
